Detailed Description

AGBackground is a helper class for widget-drawing It is used to draw gradients and tiled backgrounds of widgets. It is themable.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AGBackground::AGBackground (  const AGString &  pThemeName = ""  ) 
 

This constructor set a themed background.

Parameters:
pThemeName a typical string is "button.background.normal". Then the entry in the theme.xml file should look something like: 
 <button>
   <background>
     <normal>
       <color name="gradientColor1" color="#12141c">
       <color name="gradientColor2" color="#12141c">
       <color name="gradientColor3" color="#12141c">
       <color name="gradientColor4" color="#12141c">
     </normal>
   </background>
  </button>

AGBackground::AGBackground (  const AGColor &  pColor  ) 
 

sets a uniform background of color pColor

Parameters:
pColor an rgba-color. so you can use transparent backgrounds,too.
